name: Tokimeki Memorial: Oshiete Your Heart: Seal Version
overview:
Tokimeki Memorial: Oshiete Your Heart is a dating sim. The game plays similarly to other Tokimeki Memorial games. However, since it is an arcade game, the time has been considerably reduced to achieves the goals.

The original arcade cabinet had implemented a reward system; once the goal is achieved, the player will get a real printed postcard.
